entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0][mono][wasm] Assertion mono-internal-hash.c:47, condition `table->table != NULL' not met #91244
    8.0.0
  • Too many duplicate xxx.runtimeconfig.json #91238
  • Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' during 'Generate code' #91215
  • Assertion failed 'isValidVectorElemsizeFloat(size)' during 'Generate code' #91214
  • [mono][jit] Optimize Vector124.Create on Arm64 #91211
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op2Reg' during 'Generate code' #91209
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op3Reg' during 'Generate code' #91208
  • Inline ManagedThreadId #91205
    9.0.0
  • Improve single file publish to allow embedding of other digital assets without self-extraction #91202
  • Scoped service working out of a scope. #91243
  • [API Proposal]: An attribute to indicate boxed value type is not expected for certain API #91191
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty #91188
    Future
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49826/test49826/test49826.sh #91187
    8.0.0
  • NET 8.0 Preview 7 Perfomance Regression: ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance #91186

Closed

  • CI build: Slow macs causing random legs to timeout #73401
    8.0.0
  • Cms signature created with .Net Framework cannot be verified with .Net Core for an elliptic curve certificate #77377
    Future
  • The `FindPythonInterp` will be removed by cmake #89424
  • Add a build to test the runtime repo with the daily Product build #42019
    8.0.0
  • Slow startup when publish single file with self-contained #79023
    8.0.0
  • ProvideCorrectArgumentsToFormattingMethodsAnalyzer throws IndexOutOfRangeException when building Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #90357
    8.0.0
  • illink roslyn analyzer: resolve code-style analysis warnings and update `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisCSharpCodeStyleVersion` to sync with `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS` #91030
    8.0.0
  • Perf is not working for JITed code in DotNet (Mono Runtime) #85706
  • desired .NET 7.0 p/invoke signature for CallNtPowerInformation() is unclear #90785
    8.0.0
  • Debugging Blazor WASM in Edge Browser - missing files #91198
    8.0.0
  • condition `var->opcode == OP_REGOFFSET` not met on Mono-based SDK #90292
    8.0.0
  • Uri.IsBaseOf(bool) not true by user info #88265
    9.0.0
  • x64 JIT crash 'Compiler::implResolveToken' for typeof(ValueType) containing array of self #10431
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Bad CastToType() in gtFoldExprConst() for a cast from long" #90798
    9.0.0
  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes.Pbkdf2 is trimming unfriendly #91181
    9.0.0
  • Publishing blazor project fails with: An element with the same key was already inserted #91196
  • Set BUILDTOOLS_SOURCE to local buildtools package dir results in build error #10922
    Future
  • [mono] Tests `System.IO.Hashing.Tests.Crc32Tests` crashing on tvos-arm64 #90499
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Unnecessary stack spill when mixing fixed pointers and refs in same method #12332
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91247
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0] Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #91246
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91245
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2254431 #91242
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add comments to binding gen tests for invocations on new lines #91237
    area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove AD0001 NoWarn from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions project #91236
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • catch closing exception in HttpListener #91234
    area-System.Net
  • Use live illink to trim framework #91233
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Code cleanup: remove unused code in debugger patch skip logic #91230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Disable failing test tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource #91226
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on Arm64 #91225
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] UMEntryThunkCode::Poison() #91221
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Emit interceptor info correctly when invocation expr is on separate line #91218
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Test hot/cold splitting in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 pipeline #91217
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix unsafe accessor related issue for full AOT #91216
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Fix various HW intrinsic lowerings for unused values #91213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix unused variable warnings #91212
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] download sequence optimization #91201
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add blazor startup measurements to browser-bench #91199
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix accumulation of repro files #91194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary JIT workarounds in Utf8 transcoding #91193
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][metadata] Replace use of mem manager lock with loader lock #91190
    area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91183
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix deprecated usages of FindPythonInterp CMake module #91206
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove get_ManagedThreadId FCall #91232
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Recommend [In] and [Out] attributes on array parameters #91231
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to ListDictionaryInternal #91224
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove AD0001 NoWarn from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions project #91222
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Prevent restore from deleting mibc cache file #91220
    needs-area-label
  • Improve usage of hashing for trimmer friendliness #91185
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Address warnings from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis upgrade #91034
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Enable `System.IO.Hashing` tests on ios and disable them on tvos #91195
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Revert perfowl runs back to ubuntu.1804 as they are not on ubuntu 2204 #91223
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update binder gen emitted-interceptor nullability to match framework impl #91180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use AVX512 to zero locals #91166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2253244 #91159
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix diagnostic creation to ensure including the URI #91145
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91061
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91008
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix invalid user info processing #91106
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix summary label not being visible on Catalyst library tests #91200
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BOOL #90981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Change debugger listening port in samples to an unused one #91192
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Enable `System.IO.Hashing` tests on ios and disable them on tvos #90984
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix Http2 MultiConnection test race conditions #91156
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing tfm net9.0 changes #91105
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #91046
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #91059
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91152
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
